subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Tour organizers are considering making the race a part of the prestigious ProTour series, which could have adverse effects. Meanwhile, Levi Leipheimer continued to lead on Saturday.
snippet: Tour organizers are considering making the race a part of the prestigious ProTour series, which could have adverse effects. Meanwhile, Levi Leipheimer continued to lead on Saturday.
